subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description:
Output 1:  Improved integrity, reliability and image of police personnel and force
Output 2: Responsiveness, mobility and visibility of the police forces increased country-wide
Output 3 :  Increased efficiency and morale of the police force through improvement of their working and living conditions
Output 4 :  Higher standards, a more competent and representative police force, promoted
donor_long: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
subproject.title: Support to Law and Order in Af

title: Support to Law and Order in Afghanistan Phase - IV
